description:
doc/install: we only need command line tools for Xcode on OS X
     Fixes issue 3973.

messages.text: LGTM thanks; this threw me once. http://codereview.appspot.com/6464078/diff/7001/doc/install-source.html File doc/install-source.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6464078/diff/7001/doc/install-source.html#newcode95 doc/install-source.html:95: in a freshly created Terminal window, if you don't get in a freshly created Terminal window. Unless you see the error, http://codereview.appspot.com/6464078/diff/7001/doc/install-source.html#newcode96 doc/install-source.html:96: "gcc: command not found" error, you are ok to go. s/ok/good/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=975bfb6bbac4 ***

doc/install: we only need command line tools for Xcode on OS X
     Fixes issue 3973.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6464078

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
